Question: This person's first job was at Disneyland, selling guidebooks on weekends and full-time during the school's summer break.
Hints: Expressing his affection through gifts of cars, bikes, etc., this person's father was stern, and not emotionally open to his son.
In 1993, this person wrote his first full length play Picasso at the Lapin Agile.
McEuen's brother later managed this person as well as the Nitty Gritty Dirt Band.
